ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:55:14 [Issue ID 4000-25435] urn:comicvine:4000-25435 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:09:36. [Issue ID 39954]
ComicInfo.Title: If Thine Eye Offend Thee...; Rats Like Us!
ComicInfo.Summary:
If Thine Eye Offend Thee...: The Tazlings fix Blackjak's eye and removes the Dark Destroyer's influence from him. Dart makes contact with Tempest, discovering that New Earth was not destroyed as previously thought. Then Morphea journeys into Kargg's mind and discovers the Dark Destroyer lurking there. She drives him out and a reformed Kargg offers his assistance to the group. And the Tazlings are eating all of the food on the ship.
Rats Like Us!: Pakrat discovers that Rident forced Ferra to set him up. But both Pakrat and Ferra have a few tricks up their sleeves to get away from Rident.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
